meanings.sent1: The tumefied ankle was painful to touch.
meanings.sent2: Her tumefied finger was red and throbbing.
meanings.sent3: The tumefied balloon looked ready to burst.
meanings.sent4: The tumefied fruit was so swollen it split open.
meanings.sent5: The tumefied bump on his head was hard and tender.

meanings.sent3: The chef's ego tumefied after winning the cooking competition.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds tumefied in the sky, signaling a downpour.
meanings.sent5: The infection caused the wound to tumefy and become painful.
